sentences.en: Agglomerate the core power of the company and become one of best companies in China.
sentences.cn: 凝聚公司核心能力,塑造中国一流的公司.

sentences.en: As the rubber droplets lose the acetone solvent, they become tacky and agglomerate.
sentences.cn: 当橡胶滴失去丙酮溶液后, 变成粘的,聚集态的.

sentences.en: Did you observe any agglomerate in the experiment?
sentences.cn: 你在试验中观察到什麽附聚物 吗 ?

sentences.en: In general fine particles tend to clump and agglomerate if they are moist or tacky .
sentences.cn: 通常潮湿和粘性的微细颗粒易于聚集和结块。

sentences.en: In general, fine particles tend to clump and agglomerate if they are moist or tacky.
sentences.cn: 通常潮湿和粘性的微细颗粒易于聚集和结块.

sentences.en: Lectin is a large molecule glucoprotein and can agglomerate the cell.
sentences.cn: 凝集素是一种能作用于细胞使其凝聚的大分子物质,大多属糖蛋白.

sentences.en: Similarly charged colloidal particles cannot come close enough together to agglomerate into larger particles.
sentences.cn: 带相同电荷的胶粒不能紧密靠近,它们不能聚集成较大的颗粒.

sentences.en: The perfect inosculation and streamline design agglomerate the smart mind and show the exalted tang.
sentences.cn: 拥有有完美的吻合度及流线型的外观设计,凝聚了智慧心思,尽显尊贵气息.

sentences.en: The shape of this galaxy indicates an obvious tendency for its matter to agglomerate.
sentences.cn: 这个银河系的形状表明它的物质明显地有团聚在一起的趋势.

sentences.en: The system determine the size and distribution of the agglomerate.
sentences.cn: 这个系统确定凝聚的大小和分布.

sentences.en: These small particles agglomerate together to form larger clusters.
sentences.cn: 这些颗粒聚结形成较大的团。

words.tran_cn: 会凝聚的；[冶] 烧结的，凝结的
凝聚的；[植][无脊椎]成团的，[冶]结块的
[冶]团块；[岩]集块岩；[化学]附聚物

trans.tran_cn: 成团的，结块的，<植>群生的，密集的
<冶>团块，<地质>集块岩，（杂乱的）堆积，<化>凝聚物
trans.tran_en: a type of rock formed from pieces of material from a  volcano  that have melted together
to form or be formed into a mass or cluster; collect
